Field Label:
If someone chooses the underlined answers, they might have an unmet health-related social need.

Living Situation
What is your living situation today?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: UNDEFINED_CODE, I have a steady place to live|UNDEFINED_CODE_1, I have a place to live today, but I am worried about losing it in the future|UNDEFINED_CODE_2, I do not have a steady place to live (I am temporarily staying with others, in a hotel, in a shelter, living outside on the street, on a beach, in a car, abandoned building, bus or train station, or in a park)

Field Label: Think about the place you live. Do you have problems with any of the following? CHOOSE ALL THAT APPLY
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: UNDEFINED_CODE, Pests such as bugs, ants, or mice | UNDEFINED_CODE_1, Mold | UNDEFINED_CODE_2, Lead paint or pipes | UNDEFINED_CODE_3, Lack of heat | UNDEFINED_CODE_4, Oven or stove not working | UNDEFINED_CODE_5, Smoke detectors missing or not working | UNDEFINED_CODE_6, Water leaks | UNDEFINED_CODE_7, None of the above

Field Label:
Scoring

Underlined answer options indicate positive responses for the associated health-related social need.

Item 1: The second answer option is intended to identify beneficiaries who are at risk of losing their housing for any reason, including inability to pay a mortgage or rent. The third answer option is intended to identify beneficiaries who are homeless. Selecting either option 2 or option 3 would indicate that the beneficiary has a housing need for the purposes of the AHC Model.

Item 2: Selecting any answer option other than "none of the above"would indicate that the beneficiary has a housing need for the purposes of the AHC Model.
